summary: A man and a woman go out on a "big" third date. He's ashamed to admit he just lost his job, and she's afraid he'll run away if he finds out that she has a kid. Small lies lead to bigger ones and the night gets crazy very soon.
cast: Martin Short|Annette O'Toole|Paul Reiser|Joanna Kerns|Jessica Puscas|Lee Arenberg|Corinne Bohrer|Jason Stuart|Shelley Taylor Morgan|Eric Poppick|Lori Hall|Mary Gillis|Patty Regan|Marti Muller|David Nail|Michael David Simms
title: Una cita especial
